title: jaya bhErikai
sahitya:
jaya bhEriki koTTaDA koTTaDA jaya bhErikai koTTaDA

caraNam 1

 bhayamenum peitanaiyaDittOm poimaip-pAmbaip-piLanduyiraik-kuDittOm
viyan-ulaganaittum amudena nigarum vEda vAzhvinaik-kai piDittOm
   
caraNam 2

 iraviyin oLiyiDaik-kuLittOm oLi innamudinaik-kaNDu kaLittOm
karavinil vanduyirk-kulattinai azhikkum kAvalan naDunaDunga vizhittOm
   
caraNam 3

 kAkkai kuruvi engaL jAti nIL kaDalum malaiyum engaL kUTTam
nOkkud-dishaiyellAm nAmanri vErillai nOkka nOkkaLiyATTam
